scripts.ローカルAPIサーバ: npm run test && npx env-cmd -f .env.dev ts-node-dev --respawn src/app.ts
scripts.ローカルDocker: docker compose --env-file .env.dev -f docker-compose_webapi_dev.yml build && docker container run --rm -p 8080:8080 --init --name bookutilapidev bookutilapidev
scripts.開発環境バッチ実行: npm run test && npm run build && npx env-cmd -f .env.dev node dist/batch/hoge.js
scripts.タグ削除: npm run test && npm run build && npx env-cmd -f .env.prod node dist/batch/deleteTag.js 参考文献
scripts.本番環境バッチ実行: npm run test && npm run build && npx env-cmd -f .env.prod node dist/batch/setTimeslipTag.js
scripts.APIサーバデプロイ: npm-run-all setGcloudProject createDockerImage setTagToDockerImage pushDockerImage deployCloudRun
scripts.図書館チェックデプロイ: npm-run-all setGcloudProject createDockerImageCheckLibrary setTagToDockerImageCheckLibrary pushDockerImageCheckLibrary deployCloudRunCheckLibrary
scripts.新刊通知デプロイ: npm-run-all setGcloudProject createDockerImageAlertNewBook setTagToDockerImageAlertNewBook pushDockerImageAlertNewBook deployCloudRunAlertNewBook
scripts.createDockerImage: npm run test && docker-compose --env-file .env.prod -f docker-compose_webapi.yml build
scripts.createDockerImageCheckLibrary: npm run test && docker-compose --env-file .env.prod -f docker-compose_checkLibrary.yml build
scripts.createDockerImageAlertNewBook: npm run test && docker-compose --env-file .env.prod -f docker-compose_alertNewBook.yml build
scripts.setTagToDockerImage: docker tag bookutilapi asia-docker.pkg.dev/bookutil/asia.gcr.io/bookutil/bookutilapi:v1 && docker tag bookutilapi asia-docker.pkg.dev/bookutil/asia.gcr.io/bookutil/bookutilapi:latest
scripts.setTagToDockerImageCheckLibrary: docker tag bookutilchecklibrary asia-docker.pkg.dev/bookutil/asia.gcr.io/bookutil/bookutilchecklibrary:v1 && docker tag bookutilchecklibrary asia-docker.pkg.dev/bookutil/asia.gcr.io/bookutil/bookutilchecklibrary:latest
scripts.setTagToDockerImageAlertNewBook: docker tag bookutilalertnewbook asia-docker.pkg.dev/bookutil/asia.gcr.io/bookutil/bookutilalertnewbook:v1 && docker tag bookutilalertnewbook asia-docker.pkg.dev/bookutil/asia.gcr.io/bookutil/bookutilalertnewbook:latest
